item.title: Install kubernetes cluster on Ubuntu
item.description: Thought while my code was compiling and being tested I would throw up some thoughts about it. For those who don’t know you should probably go and read something else, since what follows is going to be pretty technical. So LINQ to SQL. At first I was totally opposed to it. The idea of taking a language that most developers know (SQL) and morphing it into something that .NET can use and slightly resembles SQL didn’t really appeal to me.
